title: Brand Designer
description:
About the Team
  
  

OpenAI didn’t begin as a traditional company. It began as an idea: that artificial intelligence could be developed in a way that benefits everyone. As a creative team, our role is to help make sure
  
  

the work behind that idea is understood, as it leaves the lab and meets the world.
  
  

This company works at the frontier of intelligence. Like any frontier, it’s unfinished, constantly shifting, and still being explored. Our job is to stay close to that uncertainty and help shape how this story gets told, in a way that feels grounded and human. We do this through campaigns, launches, films, brand systems, and work that doesn’t fit neatly into any of those categories yet. This team is for people who want to help shape something from the beginning.
  
  

About the Role
  
  

We’re seeking a Brand Designer to define, evolve, and execute OpenAI’s visual identity across brand, marketing, and product\-led storytelling environments. This role encompasses the full scope of brand design, including shaping and maintaining core identity systems, designing high\-impact marketing and launch assets, and stewarding the consistency and quality of the brand’s visual language. In addition, the role owns how OpenAI’s product identity and UI principles extend beyond the interface into expressive brand applications.
  
  

This role sits at the intersection of product design and brand expression, ensuring that OpenAI’s interface, visual systems, and marketing materials form a cohesive and recognizable whole. You’ll design and deliver day\-to\-day brand work across campaigns, web, motion, print, and environmental touch points, while translating the product’s design language into scalable creative systems that align how the product looks, feels, and communicates both inside and outside the interface.
  
  

This role formalizes and scales a function that is already driving measurable impact by connecting the evolution of OpenAI’s UI with brand identity and marketing expression, strengthening clarity, consistency, and recognition across every touch point.
  
  

In this role, you will
  
  

Extend product design into brand expression through leading the design of marketing and communication materials that reflect the evolving product UI.
  
  

Create cohesive systems for web, animation, print, and OOH campaigns that maintain fidelity to the product’s experience.
  
  

Develop and maintain expressive UI systems by building, documenting, and evolving a shared set of design principles and components that connect brand and product.
  
  

Ensure updates to the product interface are mirrored in marketing and creative materials through clear, scalable guidelines.
  
  

Collaborate with cross\-functional partners by working closely with product design, marketing, motion, and creative teams to ensure consistency and continuity across all visual outputs.
  
  

Partner with producers, engineers, and brand designers to extend the product identity into new mediums.
  
  

Drive visibility and alignment by championing the importance of a unified product expression across the company.
  
  

Present frameworks, updates, and guidelines that help XFN partners apply the system effectively and maintain visual cohesion.
  
  

Own how the product shows up by guiding how OpenAI’s products are represented across key channels, including web, campaigns, OOH, print, and video.
  
  

Establish scalable templates, systems, and visual standards that enable other teams to move quickly while staying on brand.
  
  

Contribute to brand system evolution by collaborating with brand leadership to evolve OpenAI’s core visual language.
  
  

Explore expressive ways to communicate the personality of our products through typography, color, motion, and layout.
  
  

Design and execute brand assets by creating high\-quality visual work for campaigns, launches, and ongoing marketing initiatives.
  
  

Maintain a high bar for craft, clarity, and consistency across all deliverables.
  
  

Steward brand identity and quality by upholding and apply brand guidelines across internal and external\-facing work.
  
  

Ensure visual consistency and quality across all touch points.
  
  

Support brand operations and scale by contributing to brand documentation, toolkits, and internal resources.
  
  

Provide feedback, creative direction, and design support to help teams work efficiently and on brand.
  
  

You might thrive in this role if you
  
  

Have 4\+ years of experience in creating comprehensive design systems across various touch points, including communications, marketing, and product design.
  
  

Possess skills in design areas such as motion, illustration, typography, writing for design, photography, and data information visualization.
  
  

Are able to create brand systems, behaviors, and design solutions with a high level of craftsmanship.
  
  

Have innovative design thinking across a range of communication and marketing touch points.
  
  

Work collaboratively, balancing the needs of stakeholders and simplifying complex ideas into compelling concepts.
  
  

Have a deep appreciation for aesthetics, user experience, and the ethical aspects of design in AI.
  
  

Are an adaptable, quick learner, comfortable in a fast\-paced, ambiguous environment.
  
  

Demonstrate detail\-oriented work, from concept to final output.
  
  

Enjoy collaborating with creatives, researchers, product managers, product marketers, and engineers to serve a global audience.
  
  

About OpenAI
  
  

OpenAI is an AI research and deployment company dedicated to ensuring that general\-purpose artificial intelligence benefits all of humanity. We push the boundaries of the capabilities of AI systems and seek to safely deploy them to the world through our products. AI is an extremely powerful tool that must be created with safety and human needs at its core, and to achieve our mission, we must encompass and value the many different perspectives, voices, and experiences that form the full spectrum of humanity.
  
  

We are an equal opportunity employer, and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, age, veteran status, disability, genetic information, or other applicable legally protected characteristic.
  
  

For additional information, please see
  
  

OpenAI’s Affirmative Action and Equal Employment Opportunity Policy Statement
  
  

.
  
  

Background checks for applicants will be administered in accordance with applicable law, and qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment consistent with those laws, including the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, the Los Angeles County Fair Chance Ordinance for Employers, and the California Fair Chance Act, for US\-based candidates. For unincorporated Los Angeles County workers: we reasonably believe that criminal history may have a direct, adverse and negative relationship with the following job duties, potentially resulting in the withdrawal of a conditional offer of employment: protect computer hardware entrusted to you from theft, loss or damage; return all computer hardware in your possession (including the data contained therein) upon termination of employment or end of assignment; and maintain the confidentiality of proprietary, confidential, and non\-public information. In addition, job duties require access to secure and protected information technology systems and related data security obligations.
  
  

To notify OpenAI that you believe this job posting is non\-compliant, please submit a report through
  
  

this form
  
  

. No response will be provided to inquiries unrelated to job posting compliance.
  
  

We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with disabilities.
  
  

OpenAI Global Applicant Privacy Policy
  
  

At OpenAI, we believe artificial intelligence has the potential to help people solve immense global challenges, and we want the upside of AI to be widely shared. Join us in shaping the future of technology.
  
  

Compensation
  
  

$190K \+ Offers Equity

title: Product Marketing Manager
description:
About the Team
  
  

Like every team at OpenAI, the Marketing team contributes to our broader mission of ensuring responsible and widespread adoption of artificial intelligence. With that aim in mind, we are responsible for developing and executing strategies that drive awareness, engagement, and usage for OpenAI’s products and platform amongst our core audiences. We take a data\-driven approach to understand our customers' needs and challenges, ensuring that their voices are reflected in product development and messaging. We then partner closely with Product, Engineering, Research, Comms, and Design teams to create a cohesive customer experience across all our channels. Our focus extends beyond just promoting product features; we aim to provide valuable insights and resources that help our users make the most out of AI technologies.
  
  

About the role
  
  

We’re looking for a creative, insight\-driven marketer to help shape how the world talks about and experiences what we build next, our hardware.
  
  

You’ll report to the Product Marketing Lead for Hardware and partner closely with brand, creative, comms, product, design and research teams. Your job is to find the human truth inside the technology, then bring it to life through bold, integrated campaigns across paid, in\-product, lifecycle, organic and new things you dream up.
  
  

**In this role, you will:**  

Start with an objective and turn it into a sharp, insights\-driven go\-to\-market strategy.
  
  

**Go deep on the product:** understand what makes it truly different and special – and define a narrative for how it shows up in people’s lives.
  
  

Work with research and strategy partners to uncover the human and cultural insights that unlock growth.
  
  

Write marketing and creative briefs that don’t just describe what to make – they inspire ideas people want to build.
  
  

Shape integrated campaigns across channels (brand, paid, organic, lifecycle, in\-product) that drive real changes in awareness, understanding, and behavior.
  
  

Partner with designers, writers, and creative teams to push the work from great to impactful.
  
  

Use product data and user feedback to learn what’s working, what’s not, and where the next opportunity is – then evolve the strategy.
  
  

You might be a great fit if you…
  
  

Are a creative at heart. You inspire people to do their best work, you know great ideas when you see them, and how to push teams toward braver, sharper communication. You approach every task – whether it's a brief, a deck or written feedback – as an opportunity to apply your craft.
  
  

Can take something complex and make it feel simple, human, and emotionally clear.
  
  

Don’t necessarily have a tech background, but have experience taking a product, finding what makes it magical, and telling a brand story around it.
  
  

**Think in systems:** you naturally connect product, brand, channels, and user experience into one cohesive story.
  
  

Have a track record of building campaigns or launches that didn’t just ship – they changed how people saw or used a product.
  
  

Are comfortable working across disciplines (product, research, brand, creative, growth) and turning many perspectives into one strong point of view.
  
  

Have 10\+ years of experience in consumer, product, or brand\-driven marketing in tech, entertainment, or a beloved consumer product.
  
  

About OpenAI
  
  

OpenAI is an AI research and deployment company dedicated to ensuring that general\-purpose artificial intelligence benefits all of humanity. We push the boundaries of the capabilities of AI systems and seek to safely deploy them to the world through our products. AI is an extremely powerful tool that must be created with safety and human needs at its core, and to achieve our mission, we must encompass and value the many different perspectives, voices, and experiences that form the full spectrum of humanity.
  
  

We are an equal opportunity employer, and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, age, veteran status, disability, genetic information, or other applicable legally protected characteristic.
  
  

For additional information, please see
  
  

OpenAI’s Affirmative Action and Equal Employment Opportunity Policy Statement
  
  

.
  
  

Background checks for applicants will be administered in accordance with applicable law, and qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment consistent with those laws, including the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, the Los Angeles County Fair Chance Ordinance for Employers, and the California Fair Chance Act, for US\-based candidates. For unincorporated Los Angeles County workers: we reasonably believe that criminal history may have a direct, adverse and negative relationship with the following job duties, potentially resulting in the withdrawal of a conditional offer of employment: protect computer hardware entrusted to you from theft, loss or damage; return all computer hardware in your possession (including the data contained therein) upon termination of employment or end of assignment; and maintain the confidentiality of proprietary, confidential, and non\-public information. In addition, job duties require access to secure and protected information technology systems and related data security obligations.

title: Product Design Intern (Monetization Ads) - 2026 Summer (BS/MS)
description:
Design
  
  

Product Design Intern (Monetization Ads) \- 2026 Summer (BS/MS)
  
  

Location
  
:
  
  

San Jose
  
  

Employment Type
  
:
  
  

Intern
  
  

Job Code
  
:
  
  

A103674
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

As the window of TikTok's business services, our TikTok UED Monetization team aims to enable clients to effortlessly connect with audiences and maximize brand potential. We want to ease and inspire clients to achieve their goals, explore more possibilities, and create value with TikTok. As a product design intern, you will be able to utilize mixed methods to collect user feedback, create a deep understanding and empathy for our customers, and work cross\-functionally with design, product, and marketing teams to meet business needs.
  
  

Our core design team includes researchers, product designers, and UX writers who are passionate about quality, usability, and simplicity. We work with collaborative cross\-functional teams to solve complex challenges and craft experiences that highlight our products’ unique capabilities and personalities.
  
  

We are looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2026\. Internships at our Company aim to offer students industry exposure and hands\-on experience. Watch your ambitions become reality as your inspiration brings infinite opportunities at our Company.
  
  

Internships at Our Company aims to provide students with hands\-on experience in developing fundamental skills and exploring potential career paths. A vibrant blend of social events and enriching development workshops will be available for you to explore. Here, you will utilize your knowledge in real\-world scenarios while laying a strong foundation for personal and professional growth.
  
  

Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to Our Company and its affiliates' jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis \- we encourage you to apply early. Please state your availability clearly in your resume (Start date, End date).
  
  

**Summer Start Dates:**  

May 11th, 2026
  
May 18th, 2026
  
May 26th, 2026
  
June 8th, 2026
  
June 22nd, 2026
  
  

**In this role, you will:**  

* Support the end\-to\-end design of internal tools and platforms that enable TikTok global employees to accomplish their goals efficiently and productively in a smooth manner.
* Own every aspect of a product's design, from solving the core user challenge to shipping a well\-tested and pixel\-perfect UI
* Create and test rough prototypes early in the design process to create confidence in a solution
* Design high\-fidelity UI and UX specs to clearly communicate requirements to your team's engineers


Qualifications
  
  

**Minimum Qualifications:**  

* Currently enrolled in a Bachelor’s or Master’s program; strong interest in product design
* Experienced in designing and shipping end\-to\-end products
* Ability to provide design variations and rational your design choices
* Must be able to commit to a 12\-week full\-time work period during Summer 2026\.


Job Information
  
  

【For Pay Transparency】Compensation Description (Hourly) \- Campus Intern
  
  

The hourly rate range for this position in the selected city is $30\- $50\.
  
  

​
  
  

Benefits may vary depending on the nature of employment and the country work location. Interns have day one access to health insurance, life insurance, wellbeing benefits and more. Interns also receive 10 paid holidays per year and paid sick time (56 hours if hired in first half of year, 40 if hired in second half of year). Interns who are not working 100% remote may also be eligible for housing allowance.
  
  

​
  
  

The Company reserves the right to modify or change these benefits programs at any time, with or without notice.
  
  

​
  
  

**For Los Angeles County (unincorporated) Candidates:**  

​
  
  

Qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment in accordance with all federal, state, and local laws including the Los Angeles County Fair Chance Ordinance for Employers and the California Fair Chance Act. Our company believes that criminal history may have a direct, adverse and negative relationship on the following job duties, potentially resulting in the withdrawal of the conditional offer of employment:
  
  

​
  
  

1\. Interacting and occasionally having unsupervised contact with internal/external clients and/or colleagues;
  
  

​
  
  

2\. Appropriately handling and managing confidential information including proprietary and trade secret information and access to information technology systems; and
  
  

​
  
  

3\. Exercising sound judgment.
  
  

​
  
  

About TikTok
  
  

TikTok is the leading destination for short\-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and we also have offices in New York City, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.
  
  

​
  
  

Why Join Us
  
  

Inspiring creativity is at the core of TikTok's mission. Our innovative product is built to help people authentically express themselves, discover and connect – and our global, diverse teams make that possible. Together, we create value for our communities, inspire creativity and bring joy \- a mission we work towards every day.
  
  

​
  
  

We strive to do great things with great people. We lead with curiosity, humility, and a desire to make impact in a rapidly growing tech company. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn and innovate as one team. We're resilient and embrace challenges as they come. By constantly iterating and fostering an "Always Day 1" mindset, we achieve meaningful breakthroughs for ourselves, our company, and our users. When we create and grow together, the possibilities are limitless. Join us.
  
  

​
  
  

​
  
  

Diversity \& Inclusion
  
  

​
  
  

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.
  
  

​
  
  

TikTok Accommodation
  
  

TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations in our recruitment processes for candidates with disabilities, pregnancy, sincerely held religious beliefs or other reasons protected by applicable laws. If you need assistance or a reasonable accommodation, please reach out to us at
  
  

https://tinyurl.com/RA\-request

title: Brand Design Manager
description:
Blockstream was founded in 2014 by Dr. Adam Back and a group of fellow cryptographers and engineers who are passionate about Bitcoin and its potential to change the world. Today, Blockstream is the leading Bitcoin company, providing cutting\-edge infrastructure solutions for enterprises, institutions, and individual Bitcoin users. We develop industry\-leading Bitcoin self\-custody solutions, Bitcoin\-based financial products, second\-layer scaling technologies, and enterprise\-grade blockchain infrastructure.  

  

We are seeking a highly hands\-on, detail\-oriented and creative **Brand Design Manager** who can bridge brand strategy, design, and execution. You will not only define how a brand should look, feel, and communicate but will also roll up your sleeves to create the assets, systems, and frameworks that bring it to life. You will develop a unified brand identity across products, audiences, and channels. You will work closely with design, marketing, product, business, and leadership teams to drive clarity, cohesion, and quality across the entire brand ecosystem and enhance our brand.

### **What You Will Be Doing (Responsibilities):**

* Develop and refine the overarching brand strategy, vision, and narrative that align with company goals and values.
* Build and maintain scalable brand design systems (visual identity, typography, iconography, patterns, templates) while adapting to consumer, enterprise, and developer audiences.
* Partner with product design teams to evolve the brand aesthetic across web, product UI, marketing, social channels, and more.
* Partner with marketing, product, and business teams to align brand with company objectives and go\-to\-market plans.
* Ensure brand cohesion as we expand into new product lines and enterprise offerings.
* Stay current with industry best practices to keep the brand fresh and relevant.

### **What We Look For In You (Required Qualifications):**

* Proven experience as a brand designer, producer, or similar role.
* Experience building design systems, style guides, and modular brand frameworks.
* Strong ability to translate strategy into compelling visual and verbal identity systems.
* Strong understanding of integrated marketing, user journeys, and multi\-channel campaigns (web, product, content, social, events).
* Hands\-on design skills (Figma, Illustrator, InDesign, etc.) where you can create assets yourself.
* Experience in motion graphics and content management systems (CMS).
* Experience working in a tech\-driven industry or with SaaS products.

### **Nice To Haves (Preferred Qualifications):**

* Experience in fintech, Web3, Bitcoin, or complex technical products.


**Stay Safe from Job Scams**  

All official Blockstream communication will come from an **@****blockstream.com** email address. We will never ask you to share sensitive information or purchase equipment during the hiring process. If in doubt, contact us at hr@blockstream.com. Learn more about avoiding job scams here.

title: User Interface Designer (Member of AI & Innovation)
description:
About Gen:
Gen is a global leader in consumer cyber safety, focused on empowering people to live freely and confidently in an increasingly digital world. Serving nearly 500 million users across more than 150 countries, Gen builds trusted products that protect what matters most—identity, privacy, security, and financial well\-being. As technology evolves, so does Gen’s role: we don’t just respond to digital risks, we anticipate what people will need next. That means investing in AI\-driven experiences that are intuitive, transparent, and built with trust at their core—so innovation never comes at the expense of user control.
About Norton Neo:
Norton Neo is Gen’s AI\-native browser, built to rethink how people experience the web in an age of information overload. Neo goes beyond traditional browsing by proactively organizing, summarizing, and surfacing what matters—turning the browser into a smart, trusted assistant rather than a passive tool. Designed with privacy and security by default, Neo reflects Gen’s commitment to helping Generation Digital navigate the internet more clearly, efficiently, and safely. As part of Gen’s broader mission to enable Digital Freedom, Neo represents our next chapter: using AI to reduce cognitive load, amplify human intent, and make the internet work better for people.
What you’ll be doing:* Own and scale end\-to\-end user experiences across a growing portfolio of six product pillars spanning four major cybersecurity brands—Norton, Avast, AVG, and Avira—impacting millions of users worldwide
* Architect and evolve a unified, AI\-ready Design System that underpins our entire browser ecosystem, replacing fragmented experiences with a cohesive, high\-trust visual and interaction language
* Lead high\-impact design initiatives across cross\-brand consolidation, AI\-powered browser experiences, password management integration, Gen\-AI anti\-scam interfaces, and browser extension innovation
* Design scalable frameworks for enterprise partnerships and white\-label solutions, enabling fast, high\-quality deployment across diverse partner and platform ecosystems
* Leverage AI\-driven design and automation tools to eliminate low\-value, repetitive work and multiply design impact across multiple brands and products
* Act as a force multiplier for a small, senior design team by setting direction, raising craft quality, and enabling faster, more confident execution
* Drive end\-to\-end design from discovery and prototyping through implementation, partnering closely with product and engineering leaders across the AI \& Innovation organization
* Lead user research and data\-informed experimentation to validate design decisions, optimize engagement, and inform long\-term product strategy
* Establish durable design patterns, component libraries, and workflows that allow the organization to scale with consistency, speed, and trust


About you:* 6\+ years of experience in user experience, product design, or a related design discipline, with demonstrated ownership over complex product surfaces
* Proven experience owning or co\-owning a design system used across multiple products, brands, or platforms
* Strong product judgment, with the ability to independently identify high\-leverage opportunities and influence roadmaps and technical decisions through design
* Exceptional design craft, with a portfolio that demonstrates strength in visual interface design and the ability to scale visual and motion systems across platforms
* Deep fluency in design best practices, paired with the judgment to know when to follow them—and when to evolve them
* Comfort working closely with engineering, balancing design ambition with implementation cost, performance, and long\-term maintainability
* Experience conducting or partnering on lightweight, high\-signal research and using data and experimentation to validate decisions
* Bonus: experience designing AI\-powered features or systems, working within multi\-brand or platform\-scale environments, or launching products from 0 1

  

\#LI\-AS1
Gen is proud to be an equal\-opportunity employer, committed to diversity and inclusivity. We base employment decisions on merit, experience, and business needs, without considering race, color, national origin, age, religion, sex, pregnancy, genetic information, disability, medical condition, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, military or veteran status, or other unlawful factors. Gen prohibits discrimination based on these protected characteristics and recruits talented candidates from diverse backgrounds.  

We consider individuals with arrest and conviction records and do not discriminate against employees for discussing their own pay or that of other employees or applicants. Learn more about pay transparency.  

To conform to U.S. export control regulations, applicant should be eligible for any required authorizations from the U.S. Government.

title: Design Technologist, Prime Video
description:
**DESCRIPTION**
---------------


Are you interested in shaping the future of entertainment? Do you want to define the next generation of how and what Amazon customers are watching? Prime Video is changing the way people watch movies and TV. From one service, we’re delivering versatile ways to watch hundreds of thousands of movies, TV series, and live events on the web, mobile, and TV. Our service is available in more than 200 territories globally, and we’re just getting started.  

  

Working closely with business and technology partners, we use research, design, and prototyping to guide early product development, bring clarity to engineering goals, and develop a customer\-centric point of view. This is where you come in.  

  

As a Design Technologist, you'll be a key part of our Experience Design organization. Your role will be all about proving, advancing, and evolving forward\-thinking UX concepts through prototyping and hands\-on product work. You'll work alongside other design technologists to bring design ideas (interactions, visuals, motion) to life.  

  

Key job responsibilities  

* Build high\-quality, functional prototypes that convey and advance the vision of future products
* Collaborate with design leadership and key stakeholders throughout the product lifecycle
* Work alongside designers, researchers, PMs, and engineers to drive concepts from idea to implementation
* Advance design thinking by leveraging your platform expertise (e.g. web, mobile, TV)

  

A day in the life  

As a Design Technologist at Prime Video, you’ll have the opportunity to wear many hats. We build prototypes across the Prime Video customer journey from helping customers discover their favorite content to designing new playback experiences including X\-Ray, live sports, and advertising. Our team builds high\-fidelity prototypes for TV, mobile and web clients using frontend technologies such as HTML/CSS/JS, React.js, Redux and Motion.js. Our team develops prototypes using AWS Bedrock to envision brand new Gen AI powered experiences for our customers.
  

  

About the team  

We’re scrappy yet detailed\-oriented, knowing when to build quickly versus diving into the details to produce higher fidelity prototypes. We bring our own design vision and support our design and engineering partners to help them ship faster. We also partner closely with UX researchers to create new experiences that our customers get to test and provide feedback on. Our prototypes are demoed to senior leadership to showcase what the future of Prime Video will look and feel like for our customers.  

  

**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------

* 1\+ years of front\-end technologist, engineer, or UX prototyper experience
* 2\+ years of web development for digital marketing, advertising, product management or equivalent experience
* Knowledge of technologies such as JavaScript/NodeJS, HTML/CSS, Responsive/Adaptive Design
* Have an available online portfolio
* Have coding samples in front end programming languages
* Experience in testing and QA environments

**PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS**
----------------------------

* Knowledge of API frameworks
* Experience using AWS in production environments

  

Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of protected veteran status, disability, or other legally protected status.  

  

Los Angeles County applicants: Job duties for this position include: work safely and cooperatively with other employees, supervisors, and staff; adhere to standards of excellence despite stressful conditions; communicate effectively and respectfully with employees, supervisors, and staff to ensure exceptional customer service; and follow all federal, state, and local laws and Company policies. Criminal history may have a direct, adverse, and negative relationship with some of the material job duties of this position. These include the duties and responsibilities listed above, as well as the abilities to adhere to company policies, exercise sound judgment, effectively manage stress and work safely and respectfully with others, exhibit trustworthiness and professionalism, and safeguard business operations and the Company’s reputation. Pursuant to the Los Angeles County Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.  

  

Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.  

  

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how\-we\-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.  

The base salary range for this position is listed below. Your Amazon package will include sign\-on payments and restricted stock units (RSUs). Final compensation will be determined based on factors including experience, qualifications, and location. Amazon also offers comprehensive benefits including health insurance (medical, dental, vision, prescription, Basic Life \& AD\&D insurance and option for Supplemental life plans, EAP, Mental Health Support, Medical Advice Line, Flexible Spending Accounts, Adoption and Surrogacy Reimbursement coverage), 401(k) matching, paid time off, and parental leave. title: Senior Design Technologist, Prime Video
description:
**DESCRIPTION**
---------------


Are you interested in shaping the future of entertainment? Do you want to define the next generation of how and what Amazon customers are watching? Prime Video is changing the way people watch movies and TV. From one service, we’re delivering versatile ways to watch hundreds of thousands of movies, TV series, and live events on the web, mobile, and TV. Our service is available in more than 200 territories globally, and we’re just getting started.  

  

Working closely with business and technology partners, we use research, design, and prototyping to guide early product development, bring clarity to engineering goals, and develop a customer\-centric point of view. This is where you come in.  

  

As a Senior Design Technologist, you'll be a key part of our Experience Design organization. Your role will be all about proving, advancing, and evolving forward\-looking UX concepts through prototyping and hands\-on product work. You'll work alongside other design technologists to bring design ideas (interactions, visuals, motion) to life.  

  

Key job responsibilities  

* Build high\-quality, functional prototypes that convey and advance the vision of future products
* Collaborate with design leadership and key stakeholders throughout the product lifecycle
* Work alongside designers, researchers, PMs, and engineers to drive concepts from idea to implementation
* Advance design thinking by leveraging your platform expertise (e.g. web, mobile, TV)
* Thrive in a fast\-paced, iterative environment with ambiguous challenges and brand new customer experiences

  

A day in the life  

As a Senior Design Technologist at Prime Video, you’ll have the opportunity to wear many hats. We build prototypes across the Prime Video customer journey from helping customers discover their favorite content to designing new playback experiences including X\-Ray, live sports, and advertising. Our team builds high\-fidelity prototypes for TV, mobile and web clients using frontend technologies such as HTML/CSS/JS, React.js, Redux and Motion.js. Our team develops prototypes using AWS Bedrock to envision brand new Gen AI powered experiences for our customers.  

  

About the team  

We’re scrappy yet detailed\-oriented, knowing when to build quickly versus diving into the details to produce higher fidelity prototypes. We bring our own design vision and support our design and engineering partners to help them ship faster. We also partner closely with UX researchers to create new experiences that our customers get to test and provide feedback on. Our prototypes are demoed to senior leadership to showcase what the future of Prime Video will look and feel like for our customers.**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------

* 7\+ years of front\-end technologist, engineer, or UX prototyper experience
* Have an available online portfolio
* Have coding samples in front end programming languages
* Experience developing visually polished, engaging, and highly fluid UX prototypes
* Experience collaborating with UX, Product, and technical partners

**PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS**
----------------------------

* Knowledge of databases and AWS database services: ElasticSearch, Redshift, DynamoDB
* Experience with machine learning (ML) tools and methods
* Experience in one or more of the following: Native mobile development (Android/iOS), Python, Objective\-C, Swift, C\#, HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript, web and server programming and Responsive/Adaptive design, Java, SQL

  

Amazon is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of protected veteran status, disability, or other legally protected status.  

  

Los Angeles County applicants: Job duties for this position include: work safely and cooperatively with other employees, supervisors, and staff; adhere to standards of excellence despite stressful conditions; communicate effectively and respectfully with employees, supervisors, and staff to ensure exceptional customer service; and follow all federal, state, and local laws and Company policies. Criminal history may have a direct, adverse, and negative relationship with some of the material job duties of this position. These include the duties and responsibilities listed above, as well as the abilities to adhere to company policies, exercise sound judgment, effectively manage stress and work safely and respectfully with others, exhibit trustworthiness and professionalism, and safeguard business operations and the Company’s reputation. Pursuant to the Los Angeles County Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.  

  

Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.  

  

Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how\-we\-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.  

  

Our compensation reflects the cost of labor across several US geographic markets. The base pay for this position ranges from $138,800/year in our lowest geographic market up to $239,900/year in our highest geographic market. Pay is based on a number of factors including market location and may vary depending on job\-related knowledge, skills, and experience. Amazon is a total compensation company. title: Sr. Product Marketing Manager, Audience Development Marketing
description:
**DESCRIPTION**
---------------


As a Sr. Product Marketing Manager driving Go To Markets (GTM), you will be a core member of the Audience Development Marketing team. You will be responsible for GTM strategy and execution for Amazon Music artist, content, and music industry fan experiences. We are seeking a seasoned product marketer who is creative, strategic, has a core understanding of the optimal customer mobile app experience. You will be working cross functionally with product managers to set the product roadmap to develop and launch new product features that surprise, delight, and engage our customers. You will also work with other marketing teams (social, brand, paid marketing channels, promotions, etc.) to develop global GTM strategies that drive feature awareness, adoption, and retention across on all devices.  

  

This role is highly visible and a successful candidate must be comfortable with ambiguity, earning trust with cross\-functional teams and leaders, influencing up and across, and juggling multiple priorities simultaneously in a fast\-paced dynamic environment. The candidate must be a great oral and written communicator and possess high levels of creativity, independence, backbone, flexibility, and attention to detail. This role will be a global role, but will work with regional marketing and product teams to adapt global GTM strategies for local customers and to adhere to local regulations. This role will be a global role, but will work with regional marketing and product teams to adapt global GTM strategies for local customers and to adhere to local regulations.  

  

Key job responsibilities  

* Develop and deliver GTM strategies and frameworks, which are scalable and repeatable across various product feature launches

  

* Conduct customer research to develop insights and enhanced brand positioning to stay competitive in the growing MSP space

  

* Oversee strategy, execution, and performance of cross channel global marketing plans to build awareness, adoption and engagement of key features


  

* Partner with various product teams to develop product roadmaps for features meant to drive Monthly Active Users (MAUs), Listening Hours, and enhance the customer experience on Amazon Music

  

* Partner and consult across with the Amazon Music Industry and Artist Relations teams to better integrate music and podcast artist content into the customer experience

  

* Develop compelling GTM creative assets (video, social, Owned \& Operated) working cross\-functionally with creative designers


Provide copywriting guidance  

  

* Advocate for the optimal customer experience when working on UX design with product teams


Drive regular reviews of roadmap progress and results with leadership across marketing, subscriptions tech, and product**BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**
------------------------

* 6\+ years of professional non\-internship marketing experience
* Experience using data and metrics to drive improvements
* Experience with Excel or Tableau (data manipulation, macros, charts and pivot tables)
* Experience building, executing and scaling cross\-functional marketing programs
* Experience leading go\-to\-market for consumer software or hardware product launches

**PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS**
----------------------------

* Experience using any of SQL or other analytical tools for conducting data analysis
* Experience with customer segmentation, profiling, and targeting

description:
Our client, a leading organization in the technology industry, is seeking a UX Researcher III to join their dynamic team. As a UX Researcher III, you will be an integral part of the Growth product teams supporting innovative user\-centered solutions. The ideal candidate will demonstrate strong analytical skills, excellent communication, and a collaborative mindset, which will enable you to thrive within this forward\-thinking organization.  

  

Must have 4\+ years in product (consumer \& digital) to be considered.


**Job Title:** UX Researcher III


**Location:** Menlo Park, CA (Remote, West Coast preferred)


**Pay Range:** 60\-80


**What's the Job?**


* Design and execute qualitative user research studies to inform product decisions.
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, and engineers to identify research needs and prioritize projects.
* Analyze and synthesize research findings into clear, actionable recommendations.
* Present research insights to stakeholders in a concise and impactful manner.
* Maintain research documentation according to UXR reporting standards and ensure compliance with data protection standards.


**What's Needed?**


* Bachelor's degree in Human\-Computer Interaction, Psychology, Sociology, Political Science, or a related field.
* Proven experience conducting user research in a technology\-driven environment.
* Proficiency in research methodologies such as in\-depth interviewing, usability testing, concept testing, and focus group research.
* Strong communication and presentation skills.
* Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.


**What's in it for me?**


* Opportunity to work on impactful projects that shape user experiences.
* Collaborate with talented professionals across various disciplines.
* Engage in continuous learning and professional development.
* Be part of an inclusive and innovative work environment.
* Remote work flexibility within the United States.

title: Digital Designer
description:
**About Lilo Social**



Lilo Social is a full\-funnel eCommerce growth agency specializing in acquisition and retention for direct\-to\-consumer brands. With a team of over 65 professionals, we deliver best\-in\-class paid media, email marketing, and creative services to help brands scale profitably. We work across the entire customer lifecycle—from content creation and paid advertising to conversion rate optimization and retention marketing.



Our partnership\-first approach has earned us a 90% client retention rate and recognition as an Inc. 5000 honoree for three consecutive years (2023, 2024, 2025\). We are proud to be a Klaviyo Master Elite Agency, a distinction held by only 0\.2% of Klaviyo's 6,500\+ partners. To date, we have driven billions of dollars in attributed revenue for our partners.


**The Role**



As a Digital Designer at Lilo Social, you will create scroll\-stopping static graphics for Meta advertising campaigns while designing high\-converting landing pages that drive measurable results for DTC brands. You will collaborate closely with creative strategists and media buyers to translate performance insights into compelling visual creative that captures attention and converts browsers into buyers.


**What Success Looks Like**


* Consistent improvement in creative performance metrics (CTR, conversion rate, thumb\-stop rate) across your client portfolio
* Fast iteration speed that enables creative variations per week with maintained quality standards
* High client satisfaction through on\-brand designs that align with strategic creative direction
* Strong cross\-functional collaboration that accelerates testing velocity and produces scalable winning concepts


**Responsibilities**


* Design high\-performing static graphics for Meta ad campaigns across feed, stories, and reels formats
* Create conversion\-focused landing pages that align with ad messaging and drive customer action
* Execute on creative briefs provided by strategists, translating concepts into visually compelling designs
* Iterate quickly based on performance data, A/B test results, and stakeholder feedback
* Maintain brand consistency and visual standards across multiple client accounts simultaneously
* Design mobile\-first experiences optimized for Meta's platform specifications and best practices
* Organize and manage design files, asset libraries, and version control using established naming conventions
* Collaborate with media buyers to understand campaign objectives and creative testing priorities
* Stay current on Meta platform trends, ad formats, and direct response design principles
* Produce landing page designs that integrate seamlessly with existing brand systems and conversion frameworks
* Participate in creative reviews and provide design rationale grounded in performance marketing principles
* Adapt existing creative concepts into new formats, sizes, and placements efficiently


**Requirements**


* 3\-4 years of design experience in performance marketing, advertising, or DTC ecommerce
* Expert proficiency in Figma for design collaboration and file organization
* Strong command of Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop and Illustrator)
* Portfolio demonstrating direct response creative and performance\-focused design work
* Proven experience designing ads specifically for Meta (Facebook and Instagram)
* Understanding of mobile\-first design principles and responsive layout techniques
* Demonstrated ability to iterate quickly while maintaining high quality standards
* Experience designing landing pages with conversion rate optimization in mind
* Organized approach to file management with attention to naming conventions and version control
* Comfort working with performance feedback and data\-driven design decisions
* Strong communication skills and ability to articulate design decisions
* Self\-starter mentality with ability to manage multiple client accounts and deadlines


**Nice to Have**


* Motion graphics or animation skills with proficiency in After Effects or similar tools
* Experience with landing page builders (Unbounce, Instapage, Replo, Shogun)
* HTML/CSS knowledge for basic landing page customization
* Understanding of Meta Ads Manager and campaign performance metrics
* Experience working in an agency environment with multiple simultaneous client accounts
* Familiarity with Shopify and ecommerce product page design
* Knowledge of direct response copywriting principles and how they inform design hierarchy
* Experience designing for additional platforms (TikTok, Google Display, YouTube)


**Compensation and Benefits**


* **Fully Remote**: Work from anywhere with flexible hours and a distributed team culture
* **Generous Time Off**: Competitive PTO policy and paid holidays to maintain work\-life balance
* **Compensation:** Competitive salary commensurate with experience.

title: Creative Brand Strategist
description:
Are you passionate about making a difference in our community? Join the ImpactLife team to help us Change the World.
  
  

We are looking for committed individuals who demonstrate good character, use clear communication, and can collaborate alongside professionals who believe in the power of integrity and teamwork.
  
  

ImpactLife has an opportunity for a Creative Brand Strategist to join our team.
  
The Creative Brand Strategist brings our mission to life by leading the creative development of marketing campaigns, brand experiences, and visual storytelling across digital and physical environments. This role plays a central part in shaping how our brand connects with key audiences through brand strategy, brand systems and brand architecture.
  
The individual selected for this position will travel up to 50% of the time, must live in our service territory and is expected to follow ImpactLife’s Work From Home Policy. To view a map of our service territory, click here:
  
https://www.bloodcenter.org/webres/File/Hospital%20and%20Territory%2024x36\_final.jpg
  
  

**The Creative Brand Strategist Will Be Responsible For:**  

Brand Initiative Creation \& Collaboration
  
* Facilitate creative direction and campaign concepting for Partner for Life initiatives and mission\-aligned storytelling
* Support strategic objectives and initiatives through campaign messaging, creative strategy, and design coordination
* Collaborate with internal teams to create branded content and assets tailored to specific partner and audience segments
* Guide creative development across paid, owned, earned, and shared media in collaboration with digital and content teams
* Collaborate with the Marketing team to support the creation of content in two primary categories – education (i.e., microlearning) and storytelling


Brand Storytelling, Experience \& Environmental Design
  
* Develop and maintain brand playbooks, ensuring design consistency and clarity across all creative outputs
* Guide and review brand visuals for use in signage, environmental design, and fleet branding (vehicles, facilities, events)
* Bring new creative approaches and ideas to how the brand shows up across campaigns, content, and real\-world touchpoints
* Ensure creative outputs reflect the brand's tone, values, and audience needs


Brand Systems \& Creative Operations
  
* Provide creative quality assurance (QA) for visual and written assets across the marketing team
* Oversee the organization and structure of our digital asset management (DAM) system in partnership with the Multimedia Designer
* Partner with the Multimedia Designer to maintain and distribute branded templates, design files, and campaign assets
* Facilitate marketing’s oversight of Fresh Service ticketing and Monday.com (as it relates to internal workflows and partner resources)


Partner Engagement \& Alignment
  
* Collaborate with partner\-facing teams to ensure creative strategies and messaging resonate with and support partner needs
* Co\-create outreach tools and marketing kits that strengthen relationships with drive hosts, donors, and community partners
* Support the development of tailored storytelling frameworks that deepen partner involvement and promote shared mission alignment
* Gather feedback and insights from partners to inform creative direction and brand storytelling opportunities


Competitive \& Market Analysis
  
* Conduct regular competitive audits to identify creative trends, whitespace opportunities, and emerging strategies in nonprofit and healthcare marketing
* Analyze industry benchmarks and partner activity to inform positioning, visual identity updates, and campaign differentiation
* Translate market research and partner feedback into actionable insights that guide brand evolution and audience engagement
* Stay current on cultural and design trends that influence partner perception, loyalty, and long\-term brand connection


What does it take to change the world as a Creative Brand Strategist
  
* 5\-7 years of experience in Marketing. Brand strategy experience preferred.
* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Advertising, Graphic Design, or related field is required.
* Equivalent combination of work experience and education may be considered.
* Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and Canva, as well as video and motion graphics software (Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects).
* Strong understanding of design principles, typography and color theory.
* Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Office applications, particularly OneNote, Word and Outlook.
* Creative thinker with strong understanding of visual design principles.
* Exceptional critical thinking skills required, with a solutions\-oriented approach and a growth mindset.
* Excellent communication, planning, and organizational skills.
* Excellent time management skills with ability to manage deadline\-driven projects in a fast\-paced environment.
* Creative problem \-solving skills and strong attention to detail.
* Analytical and strategic thinking.


What does being part of the ImpactLife team mean for you?
  
Industry leading pay rates
  
* Paid training
* Advancement opportunities
* On Demand Pay
* An opportunity to make a difference in your community
* An excellent benefit package:
* Generous paid time off that begins to accrue on your first day of employment.
* Medical, Dental, and Vision insurance plans
* Free Life Insurance
* 401K with employer match
* Health Savings Account
* Flexible Spending Account
* Supplemental Insurance including Critical Illness, Accident, and Hospital Indemnity
* Doctor on Demand
* Employee Referral Bonus Program
* Tobacco Cessation Reimbursement
* Health Club Reimbursements
* Employee Savings Programs for discounts on various goods and services


**For more information on our benefits click here:** https://flimp.live/ImpactLifeBenefitShowcase\#welcome
  
  

At ImpactLife, we are committed to advancing our mission through innovation, collaboration, and compassionate service. You'll be part of a team that truly makes a difference—empowering our communities and supporting healthcare through technology and service excellence.
  
  

Apply now to learn more! Please submit a resume with your application for consideration. A link to your portfolio is encouraged but not required.
  
  

Be part of something bigger. Some jobs change your life. Others change the world. At ImpactLife, we do both.
  
  

This is not an ordinary heath care job. Our work is unique, personal, fulfilling, rewarding and makes a difference right here in our communities. We offer an opportunity to be a part of a dedicated team that makes us a recognized leader in the blood center industry.
  
  

ImpactLife provides lifesaving blood products to more than 120 hospitals and emergency medical service providers in a four\-state region. In 2024, we celebrated 50 Years of Saving Lives. Over the years, we've grown and merged across the Midwest from small, independent, community nonprofits to evolve into ImpactLife. We are still an independent, community nonprofit, only we are not so small. Today, our team is 800\+ strong across four states. We are headquartered in Davenport, Iowa and have distribution hubs and donor centers in Iowa, Illinois, Missouri, and Wisconsin. Every year we team up with thousands of blood donors and hundreds of community partners to help save lives through blood drives.
  
  

Equal Opportunity Employer

title: Freelance Motion Designer

title: YouTube Strategist
description:
**YouTube Strategist for a Marketing Agency**

**Apply now: https://righteous\-chestnut\-b59\.notion.site/2a8353fd5db58038914ec212110aab34?pvs\=105** 

Knwn Local (formerly A Impact Media) is on a mission to empower real estate professionals to own their market through media.

At Knwn Local, we don't just manage accounts we drive results. If you're exceptional at client success and align with our core values: Beyond Excellence, Extreme Ownership, Proactive Curiosity, and Mission Focused, we want to know you.

**About Knwn Local**

As a YouTube Strategist at Knwn Local, you will own the success of up to 20 real estate professionals. This role places you as the strategic partner who ensures clients generate $10M\-$100M in sales through their YouTube presence.

You'll develop content strategies, manage production teams, and drive measurable results. This requires someone who takes ownership, solves problems independently, and treats client success as personal success.

As a key representative of Knwn Local, you must embody our four core values through every client interaction and strategic decision.

This is a results\-driven, not task\-driven, role your goal is to make every client the recognized authority in their market.

As a key representative of the Knwn Local (formerly A Impact Media) brand, you must embody our four core values through your work:

* **Beyond Excellence** \- We raise the bar, then we raise it again
* **Extreme Ownership** \- Own the Outcome
* **Proactive Curiosity** \- Curious minds build better things
* **Mission Focused** \- Small things build big things

**Role**

YouTube Strategist.

You're not just managing YouTube channels. You're building local media empires that generate $10M\-$50M in sales for real estate professionals.

You're the connective tissue between client goals and videos that actually drive results. You own the strategy. You own the packaging. You own the outcome.

This isn't a task role. You're a strategic partner—fluent in scripting, thumbnails, client communication, and leading creative teams. Your job is to make every client the recognized authority in their market.

One strategist per pod. If the idea of building 20 locally famous real estate brands excites you, let's talk.

**Responsibilities**

*Strategy \& Client Activation*

* Run 20 strategy calls per month
* Architect a strategy with content pillars per client.
* Achieve first measurable win within 30 to 90 days, views, leads, 1 outlier per month ranked video, inbound leads, booked calls, etc.
* Track engagement like a hawk.
* Intervene immediately when it dips.

*Content \& Briefs*

* Prepare complete briefs for every video: title, thumbnail concept, logline, outline.
* Present ideas to clients. Capture feedback. Document requests.
* Hand off clear direction to designers in Notion.

*Production \& Quality*

* Final review of scripts.
* Final review of thumbnails.
* Ship 4 videos per client per month
* Submit in advance.

*Team Coordination* \& Leadership

* Coordinate projects with your pod (YouTube manager) \& the creative teams (editing, writing \& design departments)
* Reduce resource conflicts through proactive communication.
* Manage, coach \& train your Junior Strategist (YouTube Manager) up so you can get more time back

**Requirements**

* Deep understanding of YouTube, strategy, scripting, thumbnails, retention.
* Strong client communication with clients \& team.
* Ability to lead clients and a team.
* Data\-driven decision making.
* Can activate clients fast and keep them winning.

**Results**

* 90%\+ client retention (18\-36 month lifetime)
* 90%\+ client NPS.
* First win within 30 days.
* 90\-95% videos shipping weekly.
* 50% of videos rank top 5 for views.
* 100\-1,000 subscribers per month per client.
* 5\-15\+ leads per month per client.
* $10M\-$50M in sales supported per client.

**Location:**

Remote (Work from anywhere in the US)

**Compensation:**

Pay can range from $6,000 to $9,000 a month (72,000 to 108,000 base salary), depending on skill \& experience, plus performance bonuses.

**Benefits:**

* Flexible remote work environment
* Flexible Time Off Policy \- take time when you need it
* Professional development opportunities
* Direct mentorship from CEO and leadership team
* Opportunity to shape the future of real estate marketing
* Work with top\-performing real estate professionals nationwide
* Potential for growth and other financial participation opportunities for exceptional performers

**To Apply:** https://righteous\-chestnut\-b59\.notion.site/2a8353fd5db58038914ec212110aab34?pvs\=105

We're looking for someone who formats their application with the same strategic excellence they'll bring to our clients. Remember, you'll be the strategic face of Knwn Local. Show us how you embody "Beyond Excellence" in everything you do.

All positions start with a 30\-90 day paid trial to ensure mutual fit and allow you to demonstrate your ability to drive immediate client impact.

**Why Knwn Local?**

Our mission is to empower real estate professionals to own their market through media.

We manage over 55 of real estate's top YouTube channels. Our clients close $10M\-$1B sales annually, and we contribute $10\-100M\+ to their business every single year. We can directly attribute on average over $10M a year in sales directly from YouTube for our clients. They dominate their markets because we made them "locally famous."

Our media arm is one of the fastest\-growing podcasts \& newsletters in the industry. Breaking and Building Leaders is a media brand that shares the stories and playbooks from today’s industry leaders to empower the leaders of tomorrow.

If you aren't KNWN, you'll never get hired. We fix that.

Ready to make real estate agents household names? Let's work.

**Knwn Local Core Values**

Our core values determine who succeeds here. The right person will live these values, not just read them.

**Beyond Excellence**

We raise the barthen we raise it again. Good enough is not good enough. We find joy in the pursuit of mastery and believe excellence is a moving target.

**Extreme Ownership**

Own the outcome. Take full responsibility for results. Say "I will" instead of "they should." Measure yourself by your clients' success.

**Proactive Curiosity**

Curious minds build better things. Question everything. Connect ideas others miss. Ask "What if?" and "Why not?" See challenges as opportunities to learn.

**Mission Focused**

Small things build big things. Align personal purpose with professional pursuit. Find fulfillment in the work itself. Believe that helping others succeed is the highest calling.

title: Web Designer
description:
Job Description
Embry\-Riddle: A Global Leader in Aviation and Aerospace
With vibrant campuses in Daytona Beach, FL, and Prescott, AZ—along with a Worldwide network spanning roughly 120 global locations—Embry\-Riddle proudly stands as the world’s largest aviation and aerospace university. Now celebrating our 100th year, we continue to lead innovation in STEM education, serving more than 30,000 students worldwide. Our cutting\-edge programs in Applied Science, Aviation, Business, Technology, Engineering, Safety, Security, and Space prepare the next generation of leaders shaping the future of flight and beyond.  

The Opportunity
Embry\-Riddle Aeronautical University seeks a creative front\-end Web Designer to join the Information Technology department in a teleworking arrangement. The Web Designer will help promote Embry\-Riddle through the design, development and implementation of user\-focused solutions for websites, digital signs, email templates and other digital properties.
Reporting to the Director of Web Design, Experience and Optimization, the Web Designer will create user\-centric, visually pleasing, responsive and accessible experiences for our website and digital properties. They will work with colleagues across the university to understand user needs, design and develop user\-friendly deliverables, and collaborate with the development team to implement approved designs. The Web Designer will work with content, usability and accessibility staff to ensure designs and design components meet usability, accessibility and brand standards, as well as digital best practices.
Applicants are required to submit portfolios of relevant digital projects and designs.
Information Technology provides a modern, collaborative environment with on\-site amenities, professional development opportunities, and a
flexible summer work schedule. Working for Embry\-Riddle entitles employees to a robust benefits package – from quality health care and
retirement to generous education benefits.  

 Perks Await You at Embry\-Riddle!* Health Benefits: Experience comprehensive medical, dental, and vision coverage, along with wellness programs that include preventive care and fitness memberships. Our flexible spending and health savings accounts simplify managing healthcare costs. Join a workplace that prioritizes your health—because your journey to wellness should be rewarding! Buckle up for a healthier, happier you!
* Tuition Coverage: Get 100% tuition coverage for yourself for one undergraduate and one graduate degree, and discounted rates for your spouse and dependent children up to age 26\.
* Retirement Contributions: ERAU contributes an annual 6% gift of your base salary to your retirement plan and offers a 4% matching contribution, with no vesting period.
* Generous Time Off: *Generous Time Off: Relax with 18 days of personal leave in your first year. Enjoy 9\+ paid holidays, including the day after Thanksgiving and the week between Christmas Eve and New Year’s Day.*
  

Qualifications
Required Education and Qualifications:
Education* Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design, Interactive Design, User Experience, or a related field, or an equivalent combination of education and experience


Required Experience* Minimum 5 years of professional experience in web design or front\-end digital design
* Demonstrated experience designing mobile\-first, responsive, and accessible websites
* Portfolio of relevant digital design projects required


Required Skills, Knowledge, and Abilities* Strong proficiency in web design and front\-end development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Experience using content management systems (Sitecore and SharePoint Online preferred)
* Proficiency with design and prototyping tools such as Figma and Adobe Creative Cloud
* Working knowledge of W3C web standards, ADA, and WCAG 2\.2 accessibility compliance
* Strong understanding of usability, UX principles, and digital best practices
* Ability to design scalable, reusable web components for enterprise\-level platforms
* Proven ability to manage multiple projects, meet deadlines, and adapt to shifting priorities
* Strong problem\-solving, critical thinking, and attention to detail
* Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a cross\-functional environment
* Effective written and verbal communication skills; comfortable working with stakeholders
* Innovative, self\-directed professional with strong organizational skills
* Experience in higher education or large enterprise environments preferred


Required Qualifications* Bachelor’s degree in Web Design, Graphic Design, Digital Media, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent combination of education and experience
* Demonstrated experience designing and maintaining enterprise\-level websites
* Strong proficiency in modern web design tools and technologies (HTML, CSS, responsive design principles, CMS platforms)
* Working knowledge of web accessibility standards (WCAG/ADA) and best practices
* Experience ensuring brand consistency across digital platforms
* Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously in a fast\-paced environment
* Strong collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to work across departments


Preferred Qualifications* Experience working in higher education or large, complex organizations
* Familiarity with digital analytics, user experience (UX) principles, and usability testing
* Experience supporting large\-scale, institution\-wide web ecosystems
* Knowledge of content governance, accessibility compliance processes, and digital strategy alignment
  

Application process/requirements
To submit your application for this opportunity, please visit the Embry\-Riddle Career Site and search for requisition number R310931\. Please attach all relevant materials to your application when you apply online. Complete submissions include:* Cover letter
* Full Resume
* Contact information for at least three professional references (please note that references may be contacted as part of the interview/screening process)
  

Current Embry\-Riddle employees: Please apply directly through the ERAU Employee Hub Central application within Workday.  

Embry\-Riddle is committed to fostering a workplace where all individuals are valued and respected. We strive to ensure that all faculty, staff, and students are treated fairly and provided equal opportunities for employment, advancement, compensation, training, and other benefits of employment. Embry\-Riddle makes employment decisions — including hiring, promotions, compensation, and other terms of employment — based on individual merit, qualifications, and abilities. Embry Riddle is strongly opposed to discrimination and harassment, and such behavior is prohibited by university policy. Embry Riddle does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, veteran status, predisposing genetic characteristics, age, religion, or pregnancy status, or any other status protected by federal, state, or local law, in its employment, educational programs, admissions policies, financial aid, or other school\-administered programs or activities. For further information, please visit our website.  

*Embry\-Riddle is not seeking assistance from staffing or recruitment agencies. All agencies are directed to contact eraujobs@erau.edu and should not reach out to hiring managers or staff.*

title: Senior UX Designer (Contract)
description:
**Overview**
------------


We are a passionate and unique group of people creating meaningful eCommerce solutions for the health, wellness, and sustainable brands we support. We do things a little differently, which is why we’re able to have so much fun in the process. If you enjoy collaborating with a global team of quirky individuals, keep reading for an opportunity to work with us.


The Senior UX Designer will create user\-centric strategies for eCommerce websites and execute them through interfaces that are functional, reliable, usable and beautiful. They will work closely with a cross\-functional team of designers, developers, researchers, quality analysts, and project managers to create and optimize the shopping experience for our client's websites. As the Senior UX Designer, you will be hands\-on in all aspects of User Experience design and development, including gathering and understanding business \& user needs, devising user flows, building out detailed annotated wireframes, high/low fidelity prototypes, and a wide range of strategic UX deliverables.

**Responsibilities**
--------------------

*Reasonable accommodations will be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions of this position. The below list represents the major tasks assigned to incumbents in this job. They are not intended to be an exhaustive list of all tasks.*

* Creation of useable and accessible UI designs
* Deliver design with attention to detail and well\-organized files
* Studies user behavior and the competitive landscape to determine potential opportunities to improve conversion rates
* Integrate quantitative and qualitative data into design solutions
* Effectively communicate with client and the project teams
* Learn how to read key metrics and KPIs in order to provide designs that address business problems
* Collaborating with User Researchers in continuous website experiments by prototyping and testing UX improvements

**Requirements**

* 5 \- 7\+ years of experience; strong performer with a track record of success
* Portfolio of eCommerce UI/UX design projects \- preferably data\-driven and /or best\-practice backed strategic UX solutions to specific ecommerce pain points.
* Working knowledge of DTC ecommerce / CRO terms and concepts
* Ability to wireframe, prototype and execute digital interfaces
* Proven background of frequent interfacing with clients where you're able to present / pitch your designs effectively
* Proven background of working closely with other departments: Research, Development, Project Management, etc and ability to communicate with both technical and non\-technical team members.
* A strong grasp of components of Visual Design: Typography, Composition, Space \& Form, Colours, etc
* Adequate knowledge of UX practices like information architecture, user\-flows, usability studies, user personas, etc
* Intermediate Figma proficiency
* Good to have: Figma Animation or Interaction Design ability
* Good to Have: Managing or mentorship experience
* Strong desire to learn and grow in an e\-commerce agency environment.
* Critical\-thinker and problem\-solver

  

*The duties and responsibilities described here are not a comprehensive list and the scope of the job may change as necessitated by business demands. Anatta Design reserves the right to revise the job description as circumstances warrant.*  

Compensation Transparency \& Pay Philosophy  

At Anatta Design, we believe in fair and competitive compensation based on location. We post salary ranges in compliance with state requirements for U.S.\-based roles, ensuring transparency for candidates in those regions. If you are applying from outside the U.S., please note that our pay scales are adjusted based on the cost of living and market conditions in each country.
